name: Brick Hill Color!
description:
Introducing Brick Hill Color! A new way to spice up your Brick Hill Experience.

Can't think of a color? Well.. I got you covered. 
I am linking a list of 140 different colors to choose from! Copy the HEX value down and put it in the Main Color box in Customize Settings. 
REMEMBER: If the color is LIGHT choose a DARK text color!
https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_names.asp

style_settings.label: Text Color (this is dependent on Main Color)
